meanings.definition: Not requested or invited; given or done voluntarily
meanings.sent1: The unsolicited gift was a surprise.
meanings.sent2: I received an unsolicited email from a company.
meanings.sent3: The unsolicited advice from my little brother made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unsolicited kindness warmed my heart.
meanings.sent5: The unsolicited invitation brightened my day.

meanings.definition: Not asked for; not sought after

meanings.sent2: The unsolicited phone call interrupted my dinner.
meanings.sent3: His unsolicited comments about my outfit were amusing.
meanings.sent4: The unsolicited opinions flooded the meeting room.
meanings.sent5: The unsolicited junk mail filled my mailbox.
